DOC.brief_summary: Metabolomics recently introduce human IVF non-invasive identification viable embryo high developmental competence . The investigator intend investigate embryo assessment use non-invasive metabolomic profiling lead increase implantation rate compare routine morphology evaluation alone .
DOC.brief_title: Embryo Selection Using Non-invasive Metabolomic Analysis Versus Morphology
DOC.detailed_description: Metabolomics recently introduce human IVF non-invasive identification viable embryo high developmental competence . The aim present study determine whether embryo selection use non-invasive metabolomic profiling adjunct morphology lead increase implantation rate compare routine morphology evaluation alone .
